name: International tourist arrivals by region
description: The underlying premise behind this indicator is that the country linked to the arrival should correspond to the individual's country of residence. However, it is worth noting that certain countries deviate from UNWTO recommendations and classify their nationals residing abroad as a distinct category, rather than considering them as residents of those countries.

source.name: United Nations World Tourism Organization (UNWTO, 2023)
source.dataPublishedBy:
World Tourism Organization (2023), 145 Key Tourism Statistics, UNWTO, Madrid: https://www.unwto.org/tourism-statistics/key-tourism-statistics [14-06-2023].
  Inbound Tourism – Arrivals (Overnights visitors (tourists and same-day visitors (excursionists)
  Inbound Tourism – Arrivals by region
  Inbound Tourism – Arrivals by main purpose
  Inbound Tourism – Accommodation (guests)
  Domestic Tourism – Overnights visitors (tourists)
  Domestic Tourism – Accommodation (guests)
  Outbound Tourism – Overnights visitors (tourists)
  Outbound Tourism – Expenditure (travel)
  Inbound Tourism – Expenditure (travel)
  Tourism Industries – Average length of stay
  Employment – Food and beverage serving activities and Total
source.additionalInfo: The United Nations World Tourism Organization (UNWTO) collects data from countries through annual questionnaires that follow the International Recommendations for Tourism Statistics (IRTS 2008) standard, a framework approved by the United Nations.
